summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 7%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 918 m), feels like temperature (up 1.8°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 574.9m higher than yesterday, 315.1m lower than the past week, 918.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels for yesterday ranged from 765m to 2220m and averaged 1840.6m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, a humid atmosphere. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and strong and powerful sunlight. Changeable conditions.
